ygData.subject: FW: Bind Sight broken
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, I sent the bug info to Verant and I received a response. Cool. ... From: Geoffrey Z. [mailto:gzatkin@verant.com] Sent: Friday, July 23, 1999 1:22 PM To:
ygData.messageBody:
Well, I sent the bug info to Verant and I received a response. Cool.

----Original Message-----
From: Geoffrey Z. [mailto:gzatkin@...]
Sent: Friday, July 23, 1999 1:22 PM
To: DFranchetti@...
Subject: Re: Bind Sight broken



> >
> > I like the Bind Sight spell for the most part but it does have a
serious
> > flaw. Whenever the PC that you are bound to changes their level in
> > respect to yours it stops working. When I say level I mean physical
> > ...
> > ...
> > went down the first ramp the Bind Sight broke.
> >

Thanks - we are passing this on to our programming team.



Geoffrey C.
Zatkin
Arch-Mage of Norrath
